title: Vacation of Fear
description: 17-year-old Melody Miller did not want to hit the beach during Spring Break with her cousin Valery. That's because all Valery does is party -- all day and all night.Armed with a fake ID, Valery hits the Sea Witch Nightclub, and the trouble she finds sends Melody on a journey of horror.Can Melody save Valery from the vampire that abducted her? And who should she trust to guide her to the creature's lair--the vampire hunter Max who used her as bait or the hot vampire Colton that saved her life?
author: J.G. Wilson
